message:
Hi Colton.  Stumbled on this post at the right time, as I'm building a tool to update comments in the properties of objects (DESCRLONG) in an automated fashion.

What I confirmed is that in fact the %metadata classes correctly update the VERSION values (as far as I can see anyway) - which is what I had hoped for.  It also updates the LASTUPDDTTM field (haven't tested the LASTUPDOPRID but I suspect that it will also be handled appropriately).

Much safer than just updating the DESCRLONG fields using SQL. and then trying to update the cache.
